ca.uqac.lif.cep.objectfactory

Class SettingsSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.cep.objectfactory.SettingsSet

  • public class SettingsSet
extends Object
    Representation of a set of parameters regulating the instantiation of an object.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hallé

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Class<?> m_class
      The class this set of settings creates instances of
      protected List<Setting> m_settings
      The settings associated to a processor type.
      static String s_instanceMethodName
      The method name a class must implement to be instantiated through a SettingsSet object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SettingsSet(Class<?> clazz)
      Creates a new empty set of processor settings

    • Field Detail

      • s_instanceMethodName

        public static final String s_instanceMethodName
        The method name a class must implement to be instantiated through a SettingsSet object
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • m_settings

        protected final List<Setting> m_settings
        The settings associated to a processor type. Note that this is not a set, since we might want the settings to be displayed always in the same order (for example in some GUI).

      • m_class

        protected final Class<?> m_class
        The class this set of settings creates instances of

    • Constructor Detail

      • SettingsSet

        public SettingsSet(Class<?> clazz)
        Creates a new empty set of processor settings

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public Setting get(String name)
        Gets a setting with given name
        Parameters:
        name - The name
        Returns:
        The setting, or null if not found

      • add

        public SettingsSet add(Setting s)
        Adds a new setting
        Parameters:
        s - The setting
        Returns:
        This set of settings

      • clone

        public SettingsSet clone()
        Overrides:
        clone in class Object

      • getObject

        public Object getObject()
                 throws InstantiationException
        Gets a new instance of an object based on the current settings. This method does the following:
        1. If static method getNewInstance() exists in the target class, invoke it with the current SettingsSet and return its result
        2. Otherwise, try to create a new instance of the target class by invoking its empty constructor
        3. Otherwise, fail by throwing an exception
        Returns:
        A new instance of the object
        Throws:
        InstantiationException - If the instantiation could not occur

      • isComplete

        public boolean isComplete()
        Checks if all mandatory settings of the set are non-null
        Returns:
        true if all mandatory settings of the set are defined, false otherwise
